page.title: 20A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I get up at about 7:30,get washed, then dressed.I take my time so at about 8:00 I go down stairs.I get my lunch ready,then my bag.Next I clean my shoes.At 8:45 my mum and I leave the house.We go in the car.She drops me off then goes to work.When I get to school I read a book.When people who come on the coach arrive at about 9:10 we start work. At 10:30 there is a break for about 20 minutes.We work until lunchtime, which is from 12 - 1 o'clock.There is a break at 2:20 for about 10 minutes. We go home at 3:30. I go to my nans until my mum picks me up from work at 5:15.
